substantive_content.summary: Immigration status inquiry - exploring pathways to French nationality. Reveals: arrived France 2019 for 2-year university program; married to French woman since Sept 2019; has baby; fighting for residency card with lawyer; has OFII papers, family book, A2 French level.

notes: MAJOR BIOGRAPHICAL CONTEXT: Bilal moved to France in 2019 for university, married French woman same year, has child, dealing with residency/nationality process. March 2025 still fighting for residency card. This explains France location markers in earlier conversations.
